full_description:
MaxGreen MGB-456 13.3-inch Slim Laptop Sleeve Bag

MaxGreen MGB-456 13.3-inch Slim Laptop Bag can hold a 13.3 Inch MacBook & Slim Laptops. It has anti-collision corners that can effectively reduce the probability of damage to the bottom corner of the computer in an accidental collision. The MaxGreen MGB-456 13.3-inch Slim Laptop Bag boasts a shockproof fluffy fleece fabric lining. Your laptop is safeguarded against bumps and drops because of the corner patent design. Retractable, scratch-resistant TPU handle that is firm (commonly used in car trailer ropes). Durable and smooth YKK zipper, faux fur lining protection, and water-resistant material Shockproof design: Made with an ultra-thick, automobile airbag-like interior made of 360° protective fluffy material, with protective cushioning at the bottom of the laptop with the main compartment. To make organizing accessories easier than ever, there are two front pockets with tiny and large pockets. MaxGreen MGB-456 13.3-inch Slim Laptop Bag comes with no warranty.

full_description:
MaxGreen MGB-457 15.6-inch Shoulder Laptop Bag

MaxGreen MGB-457 15.6-inch Laptop Bag can hold a laptop of 15.6 inches. The bag is made of sturdy materials. It has numerous storage spaces for Macbooks and other ancillary devices. The bag has two handles as well as a holder for carrying it on the shoulder. When not in use, these components can be folded into the pockets, and the twin sturdy handles, which are also adjustable and detachable, make it comfortable to carry heavy loads for extended periods of time. You can therefore use it as a sleeve case. The water-repellent nylon fabric used in this Laptop shoulder bag effectively dissipates water and mist. Moreover, MaxGreen MGB-457 15.6-inch Shoulder Laptop Bag is shockproof. Do not be alarmed by light rain or water splashes (please do not use it in heavy rain). Bump and scratch damage can be reduced by using a 360-degree protective soft liner that is capable of absorbing impacts and is shockproof. Thanks to its functionality and professional appearance, MaxGreen MGB-457 15.6-inch Laptop Bag will totally satisfy all of your demands, whether you're looking for a briefcase for your daily commute, a tote for traveling to classes, or a shoulder bag for a simple business trip. The luggage strap can be used to attach a laptop bag to other luggage or a suitcase. MaxGreen MGB-457 15.6-inch Shoulder Laptop Bag comes with no warranty.

full_description:
MaxGreen MGB-455 13.3-inch Laptop Sleeve Bag

MaxGreen MGB-455 13.3-inch Laptop Bag can hold a laptop of 13.3 inches. It has a front compartment with multiple pockets for digital devices and cables and is constructed of premium nylon fabric with a luxurious fur lining and 360-degree protection. It can offer superior protection in all directions. The MaxGreen MGB-455 13.3-inch Laptop Bag boasts a shockproof fluffy fleece fabric lining, exceptionally soft anti-static shockproof fluffy fabric, which effectively deflects impacts, lessens damage from unintentional bumping, and guards against scratches on your notebook. Because it is made of waterproof Nylon fabric, the MaxGreen MGB-455 13.3-inch is completely waterproof and moisture-proof. This effectively blocks vapor and water. By doing this, you may rest assured that rain or splashing water won't ever cause your laptop accessories to get wet. Additionally, it has multiple pockets so that in addition to the main compartment, you can store nearly anything you need there. These include power adapters, cables, pens, and notepads etc. The MaxGreen MGB-455 13.3-inch Laptop Bag is not only made to suit a 13.3-inch MacBook Pro with Retina Display, but also fits 13.3-inch laptops from HP, ASUS, Lenovo, and Samsung. This laptop bag has a side handle that is both strong and comfortable. You may use it as a sleeve or put it in your backpack or suitcase. MaxGreen MGB-455 13.3-inch Laptop Bag comes with no warranty.
